name: Hentai Puzzle
description:
HENTAI PUZZLE - a classic puzzle game, shrouded in an atmosphere of relaxation under the good eternal music.....
IN THE GAME :
20 levels in normal mode ....
Game mode - with a choice of grid from 3 x 3 to 15 X 15....
Gallery collection.....
Achievements.....
leaderboard...
Sleep mode where you can meditate and just sleep resting to good music
The game develops fast logical thinking and is suitable even for children in this version. For adults there is a special free DLS, where there is everything.
